xml.data:
Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.3 Paccayavāra » 2.3.1 Paccayānuloma » 2.3.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Vipāka
Kusalattika
Paccayavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Vipāka
127.
478Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjati vipākapaccayā. Vipākābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paccayā…pe…  cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ…pe…  kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā vipākābyākatā khandhā.
<< Kammaup Āhāra >>
